name: SecurityDecisionHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask security decision helper if it is allowed to plug a USB stick in to the computer”
”Alexa, ask security decision helper what do you think of product xyz”
”Alexa, ask security decision helper what does the policy say about disabling windows udpates”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: security decision helper
des: If you have some security related questions like if you should implement feature xyz or if it is allowed to do xyz ask this little helper
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
